title: Login function: success
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user has entered a correct User Name: lrbatuser@mlb.com
AND user has entered the correct Password: liferay
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps the Sign In button
custom_expected: THEN login page redirects to the site.

title: Nav function: redirects
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps anywhere in an element's box
custom_expected:
THEN page redirects to the correct page in the site, as follows:

Power button -> Login page
Home -> Main Page
Departments -> Global Departments page
MLB Events -> Events page
MLB Apps -> Apps page
Directory -> Global Directory page
MLB Calendar -> Calendar page

AND all elements in the nav have remained in alignment

(Test all items)

title: Global Departments - Enterprise Technology
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on the Global Departments page
AND the Department box for Enterprise Technology has appeared
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps on that Department box
custom_expected: THEN page redirects within the same tab to the Enterprise Technology department home page.

title: Dept Home page - nav select
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is on any page within a Department
AND the Department's top nav is visible
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps on each nav element
custom_expected:
THEN page redirects within the same tab
AND the new page corresponds to the nav element that was selected
AND the nav element that was selected is red
AND all other nav elements are dark blue

(Test all nav elements: Dept Home, Documents, Message Board, Directory, Chatter, Bookmarks)

title: Footer Facebook icon function
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that the user is anywhere in the site
AND footer has appeared
AND Facebook icon has appeared in the footer
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps on the Facebook icon
custom_expected:
THEN a new tab opens
AND the MLB Facebook page loads in the new tab
AND the URL is https://www.facebook.com/mlb

title: Header: Sign Out function
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user elements have appeared
AND user has clicked or tapped anywhere on the elements
AND dropdown box has appeared
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps anywhere on the dropdown box
custom_expected:
THEN user is redirected to the login page in the same tab
AND using the back button does not restore access to the site.
